short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that changes the stylings of code blocks on pages you visit

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CodeText is an extension that changes the way code blocks look on pages that you visit, making them look more like the editor you use on your computer. It allows for more comfortable and uniform reading experience.
